meanings.definition: Too many to be counted; countless.
meanings.sent1: There were a numberless amount of stars in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The numberless flowers in the garden created a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent3: The numberless cookies on the table tempted everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her numberless talents shone brightly in every performance.
meanings.sent5: The numberless waves crashing against the shore sounded like a symphony.

meanings.sent1: The numberless opportunities ahead filled her with excitement.
meanings.sent2: He had a numberless collection of stamps from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The numberless socks in the drawer seemed to have a secret life of their own.
meanings.sent4: The numberless possibilities of the future stretched out before them.
meanings.sent5: The numberless shades of green in the forest were a sight to behold.
